lines.text: It's really good. What is it?

[reeling a small shark in on his fishing line]
SHARK! SHARK! SHARRRRK!
[picks it up by the tail and repeatedly bashes it against a rock]
A butcher's work is never done.

[discovering Archie, the dog, dead]
Oh, you wicked, wicked girl!

[singing]
There'll be bluebirds over the white cliffs of Dover, tomorrow. Just you wait and see. There'll be love and laughter, forever after, my darling just for you and me.
You're pretty lucky. Flying in on an airplane and all that. Wow. I walked, mostly.
